definitions.definition: The state or quality of being moderate ; avoidance of extremes
An instance of moderating : bringing something away from extremes, especially in a beneficial way
The process of moderating a discussion
examples: The moderation of a large online forum can be hard work.

definitions.definition: Usage of neutron moderator to slow down neutrons in a nuclear reactor.

main_definition: The state or quality of being moderate ; avoidance of extremes
secondary_definitions: An instance of moderating : bringing something away from extremes, especially in a beneficial way
The process of moderating a discussion
Usage of neutron moderator to slow down neutrons in a nuclear reactor.
